para.style: margin-top:19px; line-height:1.0; border-style:single; border-width:1px; border-top:none; border-right:none; border-left:none; tabstops:none;

para.text: Users can make many mistakes during software modeling. Such mistakes can be very costly if left uncorrected until the final coding stage. In order to prevent this problem,
allows verification of software models by applying the basic UML regulations.

li.text: section displays the names of the elements that did not pass the verification, and their error contents. Double-click a message to move to the element concerned.
